meaningMnemonic: This is the <kanji>way</kanji> of <kanji>writing</kanji> (kind of like how 見方 is the way of seeing). So this means <vocabulary>way to write</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>how to write</vocabulary>. How's your 書き方 for kanji? Mine is terrible.
readingMnemonic: This uses the kun'yomi readings from the vocab words 書く and 方. So as long as you're okay with those, you can apply that knowledge over here.
